name: Ancient Nano Enhancer
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Both parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum #L "Empty Ancient Device" "267709" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Scientist" "267713" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Empty Ancient Device + Crystalised Memories of a Scientist = #L "Ancient Nano Enhancer" "267712" Skills: | 1250 CL | Note: You can upgrade this item with a #L "Dust Brigade Notum Infuser" "274552" The recipe for this can be found here:#L "Infused Ancient Nano Enhancer" "/tell recipe 630"#C2
